channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Feuding Founders of Two Sigma Hedge Fund Stepping Down
item.description: The founders of hedge fund Two Sigma have agreed to step down, resolving a long-running feud between the quant-trading pioneers.

item.title: Warren Buffett has so far called a top on Bank of America’s stock
item.description: Bank of America’s stock has bounced nicely over the past few weeks, but it still has a long way to go before recovering what it has lost since Warren ...

item.title: Two Businessmen Sentenced to Prison Over 1MDB Fraud
item.description: Tarek Obaid and Patrick Mahony helped Malaysian financier Jho Low steal and launder $1.8 billion, a Swiss court found.

item.title: NFL approval of private-equity money is logical first step toward much-needed capital, lawyer says
item.description: The 10% cap approved by team owners is just the beginning, a lawyer with Haynes and Boone said.

item.title: Heard on the Street's Stock-Picking Series
item.description: Check out the stocks Heard on the Street writers favor in their eighth annual stock-picking contest.

item.title: Nvidia gets the attention — but these companies are powering the AI gold rush
item.description: As the artificial-intelligence boom accelerates, data-center providers are positioned to reap substantial rewards.

item.title: Tool Up for Lower Rates With Stanley Black & Decker
item.description: Having gone through cost cutting, the toolmaker is poised to benefit from a housing rebound.

item.title: The US Open prize money this year is the most ever given out at a tennis tournament: $75 million
item.description: The purse is a 15% increase from the $65 million offered at last year’s tournament

item.title: Credit Scores Without Debt? Fintech Cards Baffle Credit Industry
item.description: So-called credit-builder cards let users deposit money to pay bills. The fintechs say this counts as borrowing. The companies that create credit score...

item.title: Nvidia has everything locked in for a positive earnings surprise
item.description: Having taken the lead in AI chips, Nvidia is bleeding its competitors dry.
